name: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Chauncey HARRIS, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Harris

parties: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Chauncey HARRIS, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 15th day of July, 2004, upon consideration of the Report and Recommendations of the Disciplinary Board dated April 16, 2004, it is hereby
ORDERED that CHAUNCEY HARRIS be and he is SUSPENDED from the Bar of this Commonwealth for a period of one year and one day, and he shall comply with all the provisions of Rule 217 Pa.R.D.E.
It is further ORDERED that respondent shall pay costs to the Disciplinary Board pursuant to Rule 208(g), Pa.R.D.E.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
856 A.2d 39
OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Chauncey HARRIS, Respondent.
No. 930 Disciplinary Docket No. 3.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 15, 2004.
